t3.title: Deploying the i18n Open Toolkit Plugin

t4.title: Setting Up The Saxon Transformer Factory Configuration
t4.desc:
If the Open-Toolkit-managed Java class path is not used or is not configured correctly
    for some reason then you must set the Java
      javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory system property to point to the
    i18n library's transformer factory.

t5.title: Setting the Transformer Factory for Command Line Use
t5.keywords: javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory ant dita ANT_OPTS ANT_OPTS javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory

t6.title: Setting the Transformer Factory for oXygenXML

t7.title: Doing Line and Word Breaking in XSLT
t7.desc:
The i18n library provides XSLT access to the ICU4J line and working
    functions.

t8.title: Estimating Rendered String Length in XSLT
t8.desc:
You can use the i18n library to estimate the rendered length of strings with reasonable
    accuracy (if you know the font details).
